review: I am not sure yet if I am or can be satisfied with the stick. The one time I had time to sit down and explore it's offerings, I seemed to have run into the paid stuff.  The free stuff I pull up on my tablet did not seem readily available or recognizable.  When I gain another few hours to spare, I will explore the offerings again.  Also, I have a LED TV with two HDMI ports, however, neither one responded when connected.  On an older LCD TV, I had no problems.  I also researched and tried a common suggestion with no luck.  I am sooo ready to minimize cable.
author: EbonyEyez "EbonyEyez"

review: We live in a rural area and couldn't get anything to stream.  But now not only can we get prime movies but we can get Netflix movies too! Works great.
author: G Rose

review: Junk! Remote control does not work properly.
author: B  MILLER

review: Works well. We need Amazon news, local, national, international.  Frank

review: So far it's perfect. thank you amazon.

review: Works great. easy to install and use.
author: Blue

review: We are very satisfied with the fire stick, frees up quite a bit of space. Works great!!
author: Catherine Alden-Thomas
